query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZMMT174 SET POSID_A = #POSID_A# ,POST1_A = #POST1_A# ,POSID_B = #POSID_B# ,POST1_B = #POST1_B# ,DPT1_N = #DPT1_N# ,USR_NAM = #USR_NAM# ,REQ_DAT = #REQ_DAT# ,IN_DAT = #IN_DAT# ,IN_USR = #IN_USR# ,TEL1 = #TEL1# ,ADDR = #ADDR# ,NAME1 = #NAME1# ,IN_DAT2 = #IN_DAT2# ,BIGO = #BIGO
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SEQNO = #SEQNO#
